ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would not recommend this course unless they make some major changes.

I would highly recommend this course to any student interested in industrial ecology or corporate sustainability. It helps you understand how businesses can work together to reduce waste and increase efficiency. The field projects in Hawaii and incredibly valuable for putting the concepts and theory into real practice in the field.
Great class if you are interested in industrial ecology. I would definitely recommend it because of the practical field work that is offered.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course greatly deepened my understanding of business and the environment. The Hawaii project also opened my eyes to numerous environmental problems I had not thought about. This class has greatly added to my overall graduate school experience, one of my favorite and most useful courses of them all!
